books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of the movie.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Al Franken
books.description: A memoir by the Democratic senator from Minnesota and former “Saturday Night Live” writer.
books.name: AL FRANKEN, GIANT OF THE SENATE

books.author: by Robert Wright
books.description: The latest research in neuroscience and psychology is used to support the assertion that Buddhist meditation and practice can lead to a deeper understanding of the world.
books.name: WHY BUDDHISM IS TRUE

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Dinesh D'Souza
books.description: The conservative commentator argues that the American left is a fascist threat.
books.name: THE BIG LIE

books.author: by Max Tegmark
books.description: An M.I.T. professor delves into the conveniences and problems generated by artificial intelligence.
books.name: LIFE 3.0

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the comedian, now the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME

books.author: by Bryan Stevenson
books.description: A law professor and MacArthur grant recipient’s memoir of his decades of work to free innocent people condemned to death.
books.name: JUST MERCY

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg and Adam Grant
books.description: Sandberg’s experience after her husband’s sudden death and Grant’s psychological research combine to provide insight on facing adversity and building resilience.
books.name: OPTION B

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951. Originally published in 2010 and the basis of the HBO movie.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Michelle Alexander
books.description: A law professor takes aim at the “war on drugs,” mass incarceration and their impact on black men.
books.name: THE NEW JIM CROW
